document.discussion_title: Surf Florida, SurfBoards, Quiksilver Ringading Boardshorts – Navy – Surf Florida
document.topic_text: Manufacturers Show Off Innovative Watercraft August 21, 2016 Manufacturers Show Off Innovative Watercraft This year it’s even hotter on the water. Marine manufacturers are really listening to what boaters want, and the hot new trends prove it. The 34th Annual Central Florida Boat Show runs today through Sunday at the Orange County Convention Center and will … Read more on Orlando Sentinel Shark […] Joe’s Fishing Hole: Experiment with presentation of flies August 20, 2016 Joe’s Fishing Hole: Experiment with presentation of flies Fishing reservoirs this time of year, many fly fishermen fish nymphs under an indicator. For those who don’t fly fish, an indicator is a flyrodder’s fancy word for bobber, and a nymph is a fly that imitates the larval or nymph stage of aquatic insects. Read more […] Kayak News August 20, 2016 De Jonge and Orton advance to kayak finals A chance to win some hardware for a couple of local kayakers. It was a photo finish as Halifax’s Mark de Jonge as he qualified for the K-1 200 metre finals. He finished fourth with a time of 34.775, slightly ahead of Serbia’s fifth place finisher Marko […] Knee Boards News August 20, 2016 Kim Hunt’s family shares moving tribute after Boree Creek shooting You were a beautiful and brave little soul, trying out skiing like Mum, Dad, Fletcher and Mia on the knee boards. Your cousins Jess and Lachy were always impressed that you and you siblings had lots of energy. We loved your pretty drawings, cards and […] Copyright © Surf Florida
